1080000.name: Draugen Original Soundtrack
1080000.description:
Winner of Best Audio in Spillprisen, the Norwegian game awards.

The critically acclaimed and award-winning soundtrack to Draugen contains 25 tracks and over one hour of original music composed by Simon Poole, audio director and composer of Dreamfall and Dreamfall Chapters, The Secret World, The Park, and My Child Lebensborn.

The soundtrack contains both MP3 and FLAC files.

Credits


Madeleine Ossum - Violin
Emilie Heldal Lidsheim - Viola
Ingvild Nesdal Sandnes - Cello
Ingvild Hasund - Vocals
Jorunn Torsheim - Vocals
Torunn Østrem Ossum - Vocals
Julie Ofelia Østrem Ossum - Vocals
Simon Poole - Piano and additional instruments

"Den dag kjem aldri" is a traditional folk song with lyrics by Aasmund Olavsson Vinje. Performed by Ingvild Hasund.

Music recorded at Propeller Music Division, Oslo
Mixed by Rich Aitken at Nimrod Sound
Mastered by Chris Sansom at Propeller Mastering
